paper_abstract: Let q be a power of 2 greater than 2 and consider the group G = PSL(2)(q). We choose the maximal subgroups of G isomorphic to the dihedral groups D(2(q+1)) and D(2(q-1)) and present the primitive action of G on the right cosets of these two subgroups. We will find the orbits of the point stabilizer in each case and in the case of D(2(q-1)) we will prove there is an orbit Delta of the point stabilizer G(omega), such that Delta not equal {omega} and whose orbiting under G gives a 1-design with the automorphism group isomorphic to the symmetric group S(q+1).
paper_title: Designs from the group PSL(2)(q), q even
